poem:
### Green Alchemy

In the quiet kitchen,  
a head of broccoli whispers  
to ancient hands. Time bends  
around its woody bones,  
transforming waste into wonder.  
A rustic symphony fills the air,  
Italian notes in the tender steam.  
This is alchemy:  
from unwanted stalks,  
a sauce embracing  
life's surprising grace.
